mapper.select: SELECT a.appo_empl_idx, a.dept_idx, e.file_key FROM employee e JOIN appointment a ON e.empl_idx = a.appo_empl_idx WHERE e.empl_id = #{id} ORDER BY appo_idx DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT f.file_idx, f.file_key, f.uploader_idx, f.ori_filename, f.new_filename, f.file_type, f.file_addr FROM file f JOIN employee e ON f.uploader_idx = e.empl_idx WHERE f.file_key = #{file_key}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_empl_idx, board_type_idx, dept_idx, board_title, board_content, file_key) VALUES(#{appo_empl_idx}, #{board_type_idx}, #{dept_idx}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{file_key})
INSERT INTO file(file_key, uploader_idx, ori_filename, new_filename, file_type, file_addr) VALUES(#{file_key}, #{uploader_idx}, #{ori_filename}, #{new_filename}, #{file_type}, #{file_addr})
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply r WHERE r.board_idx = b.board_idx) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply_reply rr WHERE rr.reply_idx IN(SELECT r.reply_idx FROM reply r WHERE r.board_idx = b.board_idx)) AS total_count FROM board b WHERE b.board_idx = #{board_idx};
SELECT a.dept_idx FROM employee e JOIN appointment a ON e.empl_idx = a.appo_empl_idx WHERE e.empl_id = #{id} ORDER BY appo_idx DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT b.board_idx, b.board_empl_idx, b.board_type_idx, b.dept_idx, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_view_cnt, b.board_write_date, b.board_update_date, e.empl_name, e.empl_id, d.dept_name, bt.board_type_name FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.board_empl_idx = e.empl_idx JOIN department d ON b.dept_idx = d.dept_idx JOIN board_type bt ON b.board_type_idx = bt.board_type_idx WHERE b.board_idx = #{board_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_view_cnt = board_view_cnt + 1 WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_idx, r.board_idx, r.reply_empl_idx, r.reply_content, DATE_FORMAT(r.reply_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS reply_write_date, r.reply_update_date, e.empl_name, d.dept_name FROM reply r JOIN employee e ON r.reply_empl_idx = e.empl_idx JOIN board b ON r.board_idx = b.board_idx JOIN department d ON b.dept_idx = d.dept_idx WHERE r.board_idx = #{board_idx} ORDER BY reply_write_date ASC

SELECT rr.re_reply_idx, rr.reply_idx, rr.re_reply_empl_idx, rr.re_reply_content, DATE_FORMAT(rr.re_reply_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS re_reply_write_date, rr.re_reply_update_date, e.empl_name, d.dept_name FROM reply_reply rr JOIN employee e ON rr.re_reply_empl_idx = e.empl_idx JOIN reply r ON rr.reply_idx = r.reply_idx JOIN board b ON r.board_idx = b.board_idx JOIN department d ON b.dept_idx = d.dept_idx WHERE r.reply_idx = #{reply_idx} ORDER BY re_reply_write_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (board_idx, reply_empl_idx, reply_content) VALUES (#{board_idx}, #{empl_idx}, #{reply})
INSERT INTO reply_reply (reply_idx, re_reply_empl_idx, re_reply_content) VALUES (#{reply_idx}, #{re_reply_empl_idx}, #{re_reply})
